00055 #define CFE_TBL_OPT_SNGL_BUFFER  (0x0000)
00056 #define CFE_TBL_OPT_DBL_BUFFER   (0x0001)
00057

00081

00083

00085 {
00086     CFE_TBL_SRC_FILE = 0, 
00091     CFE_TBL_SRC_ADDRESS   
00098 } CFE_TBL_SrcEnum_t;

00102     uint32                Size;                             
00103     uint32                NumUsers;

00110     boolean               UserDefAddr;                      
00111     boolean               Critical;                         
00112     char                  LastFileLoaded[OS_MAX_PATH_LEN];  
00113 } CFE_TBL_Info_t;
